m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model X Signature Series Deliveries Begin! | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model X Signature Series Deliveries Begin! Originally published on EV Obsession . Update: VIN #s aren’t truly representative of when vehicles are produced, so implications of VINs in the #600s getting shipped this week don’t necessarily include hundreds of Xs being delivered in the coming week or so. But we’ll find out more details soon enough. Update #2: See this:  Tesla Model X Production Kicks Into High Gear (CleanTechnica Exclusive) Update #3: Tesla Model X Signature Series VIN #1 was indeed delivered yesterday . The long, long wait is about to be over for the first people who put do
